message.content:
We first identify that the transactions are recorded by their “type” field. In each dataset line the ones with type "Depreciation" are the ones we need to use. In the new problem there are two depreciation transactions:

• A transaction dated 2024‑01‑01 with an amount of 45,747.38 (the full value is 45747.380000000005, which we round to 45747.38).  
• A transaction dated 2024‑02‑01 with an amount of 45,744.93.

Since the “final depreciation item” on the income statement is intended to show the depreciation expense for the period, we add the depreciation amounts together.

Calculating:  
45747.38 + 45744.93 = 91492.31

Thus the final depreciation item is 91,492.31.

Below is the answer in the required JSON format.

------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {"Depreciation": "91492.31"}}
